author: Moritz Ochtrop
comment: I know the website which is pretty good, but the app always says that I don't have an working Internet connection even if I do... please fix :)    Update: Got fixed, I can use it now. But I thought the app gives a beat as well, not only words, just like the internet site. Also, I don't know why I need Internet to use this app then, because actually it only gives words, where is the need of Internet?

reply.author: Heinrich Reimer
reply.content: The app fetches the words from the RapScript website. We are working on beats support. For now you can launch our SoundCloud playlist directly from the app if you have SoundCloud installed on your device.

title: Could be way better...

author: Luis
comment: Ok so the app is good,  but now it wont connect to the internet when i clearly have a full wifi signal... Come on i will bump it to 5 stars when fixed

reply.author: Heinrich Reimer
reply.content: There are some downtimes on our server last recently. We're working on that.

title: Fix Problem

comment: Definitely a great idea for an app. Creates a good way to exercise the mind and execution. Although, it would be so much more better if not for the "network disruption" or if it just didn't have to run on network service at all.

reply.content: Please tell me what you don't like about this app? Is there any feature missing?

reply.author: Heinrich Reimer

The words shouldn't always rhyme. It's up to you to freestyle some rhymes and add a context to the words.
Otherwise it would just be too easy.

comment: I recently used your website, it worked well, so I'm basing my review off of that, sadly when I downloaded your app it kept saying I had no internet connection(but my connection was strong). It'd be great if this was fixed, and if possible: could you make it offline? PLEASE.

reply.author: Heinrich Reimer

There were some downtimes of our server, keep in mind we are a small non profit organization...
Offline support is not possible because of our API :(
